short_summary: The RCMP has a requirement for Astro Digital Video Generator and components for delivery to the RCMP D Division Winnipeg, Manitoba.
description: The request for proposal is seeking bidders to supply / equipment for the RCMP D Division Winnipeg, Manitoba, from the following suppliers: ANIXTER CANADA INC, NEDCO- Rexel, TECHNET, TESTEQUITY LLC, GAP WIRELESS INC, TESTFORCE, PER VICES CORPORATION, RS AMERICAS (CANADA) INC., NOVAPEX TECHNOLOGIES INC, AXSERA INC, KEVEREST TECH INC, TELEPRO and the deadline for the submission of the proposal is 29 April 2024. Interested parties are invited to the Procurement and Contracting, 10065 - Jasper Avenue, 5th Floor, Edmonton, Alberta.

full_summary:
================

**Government Tender Announcement**
--------------------------------

**Title:** Notice of Proposed Procurement: Stream-2, E60HN-16ELEC
**Reference Number:** cb-541-81296562
**Solicitation Number:** M5000-24-3950/A
**Publication Date:** April 8, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** April 23, 2024, at 16:00:00

**Contract Overview:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the delivery of Astro Digital Video Generator and components to the RCMP D Division in Winnipeg, Manitoba. This procurement is restricted to Supply Arrangement (SA) holders who are qualified under Stream 2, Category 3.51 for the Western Region (R5).

**Procurement Details:**
* **Subject:** Electronic hardware and component parts and accessories
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Contract Requirements:**
* Deliverables must be received by June 28, 2024
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada

**Eligible Suppliers:**
A list of invited SA holders, including their respective SA numbers, is available in the attached tender package.

**Contact Information:**
Shailesh Rajgor, RCMP Procurement and Contracting Services
Phone: 780-670-8554
Email: shaileshkumar.rajgor@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

**Attachments:**
Tender Notice (English) [1] [link to PDF file]
Tender Notice (French) [1] [link to PDF file]

Note: Please submit all Proposals and supporting documents electronically through the Canadabuy SmartBuy platform at [1] [link to smartbuy platform]. The deadline for submission is April 23, 2024, at 16:00:00. Late Proposals will not be accepted. Seal of RCMP. [image of RCMP logo] [1]https://canadabuys.canada.ca/ (end with paragraph tag)
